app.name: SaveYourTime
app.tagline: Okokwenza ukuphatha isikhathi okukusiza usebenzise kahle isikhathi sakho se-digital

warn.title: Isikhathi Sakho Siphelile!
warn.message: Usufinyelele umkhawulo wakho wosuku wesikhathi saleli sayithi. Ithuba elihle lokuthumela ukugxila kwakho emisebenzini ebaluleke kakhulu!
warn.dailyStats: Namuhla leli sayithi lisetshenziswe isikhathi esingaba {{ totalTime }}

general.title: Izilungiselelo Ezijwayelekile
general.resetDataConfirm: Yonke imininingwane elondoloziwe izosulwa. Lesi senzo asikwazi ukubuyiselwa. Ufuna ukuqhubeka?

timeLimit.title: Umkhawulo Wesikhathi
timeLimit.description: Hlela imikhawulo yesikhathi sosuku yezinkundla zokuxhumana nezinye izindawo eziphazamisayo. Uzokhumbuza kancane uma umkhawulo wakho ufinyelela.

statistics.title: Izibalo Zokusetshenziswa
statistics.description: Landela isikhathi osichitha kumawebhusayithi ahlukene ngegrafu ebonwayo futhi uphathe isikhathi sakho kangcono.

blocking.title: Ukuvimba Okuhlakaniphile
blocking.description: Khetha phakathi kokuvimba okuphelele noma izikhumbuzo ezithambile lapho imikhawulo yesikhathi yeqiwe. Ungakwazi ukwengeza isikhathi esengeziwe uma kunesidingo.

steps.title: Engeza Amasayithi
steps.description: Engeza amawebhusayithi ofuna ukuhlela isikhathi kuwo bese uhlela umkhawulo wesikhathi wosuku ngasinye.

steps.title: Ukulandela Ukusetshenziswa
steps.description: Ukwandisa kusebenza ngasese, kulandela isikhathi osichitha kumasayithi okhethiwe.

steps.title: Isaziso Somkhawulo
steps.description: Uma isikhathi osihlele siphela, uzobona isikhumbuzo esithambile ngaphambi kokuqhubeka.

steps.title: Ukulawula Okunokwehla
steps.description: Ungakwazi ukwandisa isikhathi noma ususe yonke imikhawulo uma kunesidingo. Uhlala unolawulo.

privacy.title: Imfihlo Nokuvikeleka Kwemininingwane
privacy.description: I-SaveYourTime ilondoloza yonke imininingwane yakho kuphela ebhulawuzeni lakho uqobo futhi ayithumeli noma yiluphi ulwazi kumaseva angaphandle. Imininingwane yakho yokusebenzisa isayithi nokusethwa kwakho ilondolozwa ngokuphephile endaweni yesitoreji sendawo sebhulawuza yakho.
privacy.details: Ukwengeza kwethu kudinga izimvume ezimbalwa futhi kufinyelela kuphela kumasayithi owacacisayo. Ukuba nemfihlo yakho nokuphepha kwemininingwane yakho kuyizinto zethu eziphezulu.
privacy.openSource: Wonke amakhodi omthombo avulekile futhi angahlolwa futhi ashintshwe kusuka ekhasini lethu le-GitHub.
privacy.learnMore: Ukufunda kabanzi mayelana nenqubomgomo yethu yemfihlo

privacy.title: Inqubomgomo Yemfihlo ye-SaveYourTime
privacy.subtitle: Ulwazi mayelana nokuthi sivikela kanjani imfihlo yedatha yakho

commitment.title: Ukuzibophezela Kwemfihlo
commitment.description: E-SaveYourTime, sihlonipha imfihlo yakho nokuphepha kwemininingwane yakho. Lokhu okwengezwayo [hl]akuthumeli noma yiluphi idatha kumaseva angaphandle[/hl], futhi yonke imininingwane yakho ilondolozwa kuphela ebhulawuzeni lakho.

collected.title: Ulwazi Oluqoqiwe
collected.intro: I-SaveYourTime iqoqa futhi irekhoda kuphela lolu lwazi olulandelayo:
collected.storage: Lolu lwazi [hl]lugcinwa kuphela ebhulawuzeni lakho lendawo[/hl] futhi luyadingeka ukuze ukwengeza kusebenze kahle.

storage.title: Ukugcinwa Nokudluliswa Kwedatha
storage.noSend: [hl]Ayithumeli noma yiluphi ulwazi lomsebenzisi kumaseva angaphandle[/hl]
storage.localStorage: Igcina yonke imininingwane endaweni yokugcinwa ebhulawuzeni lakho
storage.offline: Ingasebenza ngisho nalapho ungenalo uxhumo lwe-inthanethi
storage.noTracking: Ayilandeli noma yiluphi ulwazi lwesazisi lomsebenzisi noma lweseshini

security.title: Ukuphepha Kwedatha
security.intro: Njengoba idatha yakho ilondolozwe kuphela kusebhulawuza yakho:
security.browserClear: Kungenzeka isulwe uma usula umlando webhulawuza lakho noma inqolobane
security.uninstall: Ungasula yonke imininingwane erekhowdiwe kusuka kusebhulawuza lakho uma ususa ukwandiswa
security.access: Isebhulawuza lakho kuphela elifinyelelayo kwidatha yakho

permissions.title: Izimvume
permissions.intro: I-SaveYourTime idinga lezi zimvume zebhulawuza ezilandelayo ukuze isebenze:
permissions.activeTab: Ukufinyelela kuthebhu esebenzayo (ukuze ibheke isikhathi esichithwe kumasayithi owacacisile)
permissions.storage: Ukufinyelela kwindawo yokugcina (ukugcina izilungiselelo zakho nolwazi lwesikhathi)
permissions.minimal: Lezi zimvume ziyimfuneko encane edingekayo yomsebenzi oyisisekelo wokwengeza.

openSource.title: Ikhodi Yomthombo Ovulekile
openSource.description: I-SaveYourTime iyiphrojekthi eyomthombo ovulekile ngokuphelele. Isisekelo sethu sekhodi siyatholakala ukuze noma ubani asihlole ku-GitHub.
openSource.transparency: Lokhu kukhanya kukhombisa ukuzibophezela kwethu ekubeni nemfihlo. Noma ubani ofisa ukubuyekeza ikhodi angaqinisekisa ukuthi okwandisiwe ngempela akuthumeli noma yiluphi idatha.

rights.title: Amalungelo Omsebenzisi
rights.remove: Susa ukwandiswa ezilungiselelweni zakho zebhulawuza nganoma yisiphi isikhathi
rights.delete: Susa yonke imininingwane erekhowdiwe kusukela ezilungiselweni zokwengeza
rights.modify: Shintsha noma yiluphi ulwazi olufunayo kusuka ezilungiselelweni zokwandisa

questions.title: Imibuzo
questions.contact: Uma unemibuzo mayelana nenqubomgomo yethu yemfihlo, sicela uxhumane nathi ngephrojekthi yethu ye-GitHub.
